answers.answer: I had one yesterday since my little peanut was wiggling to much for the non stress test and everything was fine according to the radiologist.  I have my 30 week appointment on monday but im guessing if something was wrong I'd know by now. Just relax and enjoy seeing your little one on screen!

I had one today they look at the heart for a while looked for movements and breathing movements cervix and then switched from 2d to 3d sono to get better pic of baby checked placenta, cord . It was nice it put my mind at ease

I have one every friday along with a nonstress test. I started them at 30 weeks and will continue to have them every friday until my csection at 39 weeks. No big deal. Best part is I see my baby every week

question: Due to a very complicated first pregnancy that ended up with preeclampsia and a csection followed by horrible infections by Dr is starting biophysical profile sonograms tomorrow. I'm 29 weeks and he said since my bp has been high so far we will start steroid shots next week and our goal is 34 weeks. Anyone else have these sonograms? Just trying to prepare myself. Thanks!
title: Biophysical profile sonogram??
